channel.title: Xbox One
channel.description:
http://www.xbox.com/en-US/hub/reveal
Anyone else watching? I just started a few minutes ago
Opinions so far?
EDIT: It is no longer Live

item.title: Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I feel like if I had an issue with the kinect, I’d record myself doing various things (I.E Watching a movie, playing a game) from the standpoint of the kinect, and just have it repeat while I play or watch the movie. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

I was really hoping better from Microsoft this year was planning on switching but not from what they have told or showed in the stream guess I’ll stick to sony ps4 looks more of a gamer console rather then a entertainment system. It will suck for those who are deaf to use the xbox one lol since it uses the speaking command bullshit through Kinnect or whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:37, topic:519796”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=638290.msg4306647#msg4306647 date=1369954435]

The Xbox One most likely will be banned in Germany.

http://www.tweaktown.com/news/30610/german-government-says-the-xbox-one-is-a-monitoring-device/index.html#Bhm1xzBCPxHGKJD0.99

People are freaking drama queens.

http://kotaku.com/xbox-ones-kinect-can-turn-off-microsoft-says-noting-510100564

That whole issue about privacy first started with kinect on the current xbox, it’s still an issue.
[/quote]

Soooo… Disconnect it?[/quote]

It has been [rumored] that the new Xbox One cannot turn on without the Kinect webcam being connected. Which proves to be a problem for people who break theirs.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:36, topic:519796”][quote author=Spades link=topic=638290.msg4306578#msg4306578 date=1369943480]

http://www.tweaktown.com/news/30610/german-government-says-the-xbox-one-is-a-monitoring-device/index.html#Bhm1xzBCPxHGKJD0.99

People are freaking drama queens.

Kotaku

Xbox One's Kinect Can Turn Off, Microsoft Says, Noting Privacy Worries

The state of confusion around the new Xbox One console is such that we're delighted to bring you the news that Microsoft's next console has a power button. What's more: its watchful new Kinect sensor that must be plugged in for the...


[/quote]
That whole issue about privacy first started with kinect on the current xbox, it’s still an issue.[/quote]

Soooo… Disconnect it?

item.title: Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

I am not worried about internet connection or sharing games because I never share games and I am always connected to the internet either way.

Not everyone is though.
I share games with my brother all the time, because well obviously we’re in the same house why buy 2 of every game out there?

item.title: Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:27, topic:519796”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=638290.msg4304942#msg4304942 date=1369622980]

A multi billion dollor company wanting more money? They won’t get more money if these things are true. People will refuse to buy the Xbox One even if it does have better graphics.

The only rumor I could believe to be false is the one about always online bullcrap. That was a rumor spread by a microsoft employee via their twitter, they later announced it isn’t true.

Kinect, even now, people believe it’s always on, watching you and recording, I have friends that put sticky notes over the camera because of such reasons.
[/quote]
I think the thing with paying to play games lent or bought used from Gamestop is complete bullshit. Gf Gamefly for the Xbox One.[/quote]
I feel like Microsoft would make some barter deal with Gamefly and have special licences for those games (somehow?). Gamefly buys hundreds of copies at each time, Microsoft would be stupid to lose that business.

Read full topic
